entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 10:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 6. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 8. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
